name: RUN, RUN, RUN (snat-s)
description: RUN, RUN, RUN is a game to have fun (and a little frustration with). The game is intended to be a speedrunning game. I did not finish this project because the file I think got corrupted and if anybody is interested, check out the github page for any help (https://github.com/snat-s/game_jams). Anyway, have fun!!!!
